document.full_text: british author warren ellis, whose comic series "red" was adapted into a hit film last year, is writing two new novels, the first of which will be released next year, publisher little, brown and company said on monday.
document.title: "red" author to publish new thriller novel
lines_and_colors: british author warren ellis, whose comic series "red" was adapted into a hit film last year, is writing two new novels, the first of which will be released next year, publisher little, brown and company said on monday.
